body_html: Not sure it's related, but we had a similar difference in performance between standalone benchmark binary and test app on the Nexus 5X for our neural networks, and we tracked it down to the compiler inlining some functions in the binary and not in the .so library. We fixed it by adding linker-time optimization (LD_FLAGS += -flto -O3), that fixed the issue and also reduced the library size.
